0011100101001001 0111001010111101 0 -> sum: 1010110000000110, cout: 0
0111111001111000 1011101111110001 0 -> sum: 0011101001101001, cout: 1
1011111010011001 0000000010000101 1 -> sum: 1011111100011111, cout: 0

0010011000000011 1010010101101101 0 -> sum: 1100101101110000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
